main.name: Catherine Brower
main.description: I am a software engineer and maker. I'm looking for work involving Java + Spring Boot or to colab on something fun
main.bio: Use this bio section as your way of describing yourself and saying what you do, what technologies you like to use or feel most comfortable with, describing your personality, or whatever else you feel like throwing in.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: My time at university was non-traditional. I originally started in fall 2010 but eventually had to take whatended up being a protracted medical leave. Recently I decided that the time was right finally finish my degree, graduating in 2023.
I spent the majority of my primary schooling overseas eventually graduating in Bangkok, Thailand

work.title: Senior Java Developer (Remote)
work.description: While in this role I worked on ad bidding software built using Java Spring. Additionally, I had my first exposure to Docker and Kubernetes.

work.title: Front-End Developer
work.description: At Gavant I worked exclusivly as a front-end developer utilizing the Ember framework. Gavant engaged in contract work so I had the opportunity to work on many projects. Primarily I worked on creating content for a now defunt game HTML5 game website.

work.title: Full Stack Developer (Part-Time, Remote)
work.description: Tenex was a moonlighting job where I assited with the front end portion of a web based text messaging application.

work.title: Intern
work.description: During this intership I worked is a doctorate student to process large datasets for his work in atmospheric science. Specifically, I was responsible for collecting online datasets, processing their contents and finally presenting them in a graphical format. This work was done in Java.

skills.name: Git
skills.subtext: Basic functions, Manage remotes, Rebase, Merge, Cherry Pick
skills.description: I've spent all of my professional career working with Git.

projects.title: Star Gazer
projects.category: A three.js app that plots stars from the Hipparcos catalog in cartesian coordinates

projects.title: Evaluator
projects.category: Advanced implementation of the Shunting-Yard algorithm

projects.title: Address Generator
projects.category: Generating all addresses in a region for real estate applications
